ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_pickup_fl: Increases the radius of targeted blocks.
Applies silk touch when breaking a block.
Applies fortune when breaking a block.
Increases the depth of targeted blocks.
Adds a chance to not target a block.
Targets the block hit directly instead of the relative position.
ars_nouveau.augment_desc.glyph_place_flu: Increases the radius of targeted blocks.
Applies silk touch when breaking a block.
Applies fortune when breaking a block.
Increases the depth of targeted blocks.
Adds a chance to not target a block.
Places the fluid inside the block hit instead of relative to it.
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.energy_from: Starbuncle will take energy from this battery
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.fluid_from: Starbuncle will take fluids from this tank
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.gas_from: Starbuncle will take gas from this tank
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.miner: Starbuncle will mine blocks in this spot
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.place: Starbuncle will place blocks in this spot
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.robin_item_behavi: Starbuncle will now round-robin items between multiple inventories
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.sided_item_behavi: Starbuncle will now insert/extract items from specified sides
ars_nouveau.starbuncle.trashing_items: Trashing items from ground and %d locations
starbunclemania.adv.desc.robin_mask: Acquire a Robin Mask for Starbuncle
starbunclemania.adv.desc.wixie_cook: Place a Wixie on a Furnace, a Crucible or a Cooking Pot
starbunclemania.adv.desc.wixie_mixer: Place a Wixie on a fluid jar to make the Wixie Mixer
starbunclemania.adv.desc.wixie_stonework: Place a Wixie on a Stonecutter or on a Cutting Board
starbunclemania.adv.title.wyrm_degree: It's also thanks to my two degrees...
starbunclemania.balloon.tooltip: Changes a starbuncle's job to transport Mekanism chemical around. Can be dyed and used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior. Supported familiars: Starbuncle, Drygmy, Wixie.
starbunclemania.battery.tooltip: Changes a starbuncle's job to transport FE energy around. Can be used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior.
starbunclemania.bucket.tooltip: Changes a starbuncle's job to transport fluids around. Can be used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior.
starbunclemania.builder_hat.tooltip: Changes a starbuncle's job to place blocks in specified spots. Can be used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior.
starbunclemania.chef_hat.tooltip: Cosmetic curio for Players, Starbuncles and Wixie Familiars.
starbunclemania.degree_hat.tooltip: Cosmetic for your familiars. Supported creatures: Starbuncles, Bookwyrm (Familiar). Also allows item starbuncles to read Direction Scrolls.
starbunclemania.glyph_desc.glyph_pickup_: Pickups Fluids from world and fill a tank in the hotbar or next to the turret
starbunclemania.glyph_desc.glyph_place_f: Place Fluid in world, draining from a tank in the hotbar or next to the turret
starbunclemania.miner_hat.tooltip: Changes a starbuncle's job to mine blocks in specified spots. You can give it a tool to use, defaults to an iron pick. Can be used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior.
starbunclemania.page.direction_scroll: Provides a face/direction to Starbuncle automations. When the scroll is used on a starbuncle or placed in an item frame on a block, the starbuncle will interact with the block from the specified face.
starbunclemania.page.fluid_jar: A tank made from cascading archwood logs that can hold up to 16 buckets of fluid. If used to store a potion fluid and a potion jar is placed above it, the fluid will be converted to the jar for flask/melding use.
starbunclemania.page.fluid_scroll: Provides a filter to Starbuncle fluid automations. Works like the item counterpart, used on a starbuncle or placed in an item frame on the tank.
starbunclemania.page.fluid_sourcelink: Consumes fluids to generate source. Will automatically drain from tanks below it if compatible.
starbunclemania.page.player_cosmetic: Have you ever wanted to look a bit more like a Starbuncle? Or have a cool sandy hat, horns or even a propeller? Now you can! These accessories are purely cosmetic and can be worn by players in the Head curio slot.
starbunclemania.page.robin_mask: Allows Starbuncles to round-robin items between inventories. While wearing the accessory, the Starbuncle will only pickup items from the ground. Each stacked starbuncle will carry maxStack/numDestInventories items, before moving to the next inventory.
starbunclemania.page.source_condenser: Condense the Source from Jars into a stable fluid. Will automatically output to tanks below it if possible.
starbunclemania.page.star_balloon: Allows Starbuncles to transport simple gasses [Mekanism]. Can be dyed if used as cosmetic, but will use the stored gas color when used for transport. Once wearing the accessory, use the Dominion wand to connect them between gas tanks.
starbunclemania.page.star_battery: Allows Starbuncles to transport energy. Once wearing the accessory, use the Dominion wand to connect them between FE blocks.
starbunclemania.page.star_bin: Allows Starbuncles to embrace their inner raccoon and trash items. While wearing the accessory the Starbuncle will void any nearby item on the ground.
starbunclemania.page.star_bucket: Allows Starbuncles to transport fluids. Once wearing the accessory, use the Dominion wand to connect them between tanks.
starbunclemania.page.star_hat: Accessories from StarbuncleMania aren't just for the worker starbuncles to enjoy, you can use them on your starbuncle familiar too! This one doesn't do anything, but is surely stylish. Shift-clicking a starby with an accessory will only set it as cosmetic, without setting the job.
starbunclemania.page.star_saddle: Allows Starbuncles to transport players. While wearing the accessory, the Starbuncle becomes big enough to be rideable. [Still a bit wip, might be a bit wonky]
starbunclemania.page.wixie_cook: The Wixie can now cook! Place a Wixie on a furnace to allow it to smelt and smoke items, also compatible with a cooking pot [Farmers Delight] and crucibles [EidolonRepraised] to automate them.
starbunclemania.page.wixie_cut: Place a Wixie charm on a stonecutter or on a cutting board to have it use their cutting recipes for craftings.
starbunclemania.page.wixie_mixer: Place a Wixie charm on a fluid jar to convert it to a different type of cauldron. The Mixer has two internal tanks, for water and milk, to avoid using buckets in recipes. Only works for crafting table recipes, will always consume only one unit of the fluid needed.
starbunclemania.page.wyrm_degree: Allows Starbuncles to insert/extract items from a specific side with Direction Scrolls.
starbunclemania.robin_mask.tooltip: Tweaks the starbuncle's item transport to round-robin items between inventories, also stops pickup. Can be used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior.
starbunclemania.simple_cosmetic.tooltip: Simple cosmetic for your familiars. Supported familiars: Starbuncle, Wixie, Drygmy, Bookwyrm.
starbunclemania.trash_bin.tooltip: Changes a starbuncle's job to void the items it pickups and from linked chests. Can be used as a simple cosmetic by sneaking while using it, without changing its current behavior.
